Bug fixes and improvements

- Your pets can talk! Say something or ask something, and they will answer you. Great for people wanting a new way to interact with their pet.
- There's a new version of The Mines called 'The Mines (hop)'. In this one, you're spiders!
- WingIt has gone back to the pre-holiday version. We'll update this soon though.
Launched Horror Map in The Mines

- New obstacles and powerups in the Spider Fall Crossroads
- Fixed Basketball spawning in Rem City Animals
- Fixed Ray length in Rem City
- Fixed occlusion culling in Rem City Animals

- Rem City Animals was launched. Go to the mirror and choose if you want to be a Human, Spider, or Parrot. This means that you can move around like in the game Spider Fall or WingIt
- We have 5 brand new WingIt avatars, which includes: Moth, Mechanoid, Skeleton, Bald Eagle, and a Plumed Dragon.
- In BlockIt Unleashed, we went from 1 sword to 2 swords.
Bug fixes and improvements

Expanded customization of Spider Fall avatars to include color customization and new faces.

Added requirement that microphone permissions be enabled and accessible through Quest menus.

Fixed UI in Mines, so it says 'Grab Pickaxe' when you own the pickaxe instead of 'Buy Pickaxe'

BlockIt Unleashed! Our latest mod of BlockIt lets you place blocks in mid-air using only your hands. No gun needed! You can drop blocks underneath you with the trigger button, and it's like you're running on air! Find it in the main menu or in the Rem City portals.

Holiday Avatars! It's the holiday month and we're celebrating by making costumes of the three biggest holiday icons: Santa Claus, an Elf, and Krampus. Which holiday character will you be this month? Find them in the Rem City Boutique.

Also, in Rem City, we've expanded the boutique to include clothing stalls around town. You can find three different clothing stall locations in addition to the store.
